content: If a black stone occupies the last freedom of a white stone, the latter is captured and removed from the board. That capture will be a point to be deducted from White's final count.
translations: ita:Se una pietra nera occupa l'ultima libert√† di una pietra bianca, questa viene catturata e rimossa dal tavolo. Questa cat
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
